metadata.name: System Information Discovery Using sw_vers
metadata.comment: Detects the use of "sw_vers" for system information discovery

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/sw_vers')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-buildversion')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-productname')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-productversion'))))

output.summary: Detects the use of "sw_vers" for system information discovery

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administrative activities References: https://www.virustotal.com/gui/file/d3fa64f63563fe958b75238742d1e473800cb5f49f5cb79d38d4aa3c93709026/behavior, https://www.virustotal.com/gui/file/03b71eaceadea05bc0eea5cddecaa05f245126d6b16cfcd0f3ba0442ac58dab3/behavior, https://ss64.com/osx/sw_vers.html
